mapper.select: SELECT bm.book_code,b.book_name,b.book_author,bm.rent_date,bm.return_date,bm.id,bm.reserve_date,num FROM (SELECT book_management_code,id,book_code,rent_date,return_date,reserve_date,rownum as num FROM (SELECT book_management_code,id,book_code,rent_date,return_date,reserve_date FROM book_management WHERE id=#{id} AND reserve_date is null ORDER BY book_management_code desc)) bm, book b where b.book_code = bm.book_code and num between #{start} and #{end}
